predict_diagnosis:
1. Multiple system atrophy (MSA)
2. Normal pressure hydrocephalus (NPH)
3. Primary lateral sclerosis (PLS)
4. Familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy (FAP)
5. Hereditary spastic paraplegia (HSP)
6. Mitochondrial encephalomyopathy, lactic acidosis, and stroke-like episodes (MELAS)
7. Neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis (NCL)
8. Progressive supranuclear palsy (PSP)
9. Frontotemporal lobar degeneration (FTLD)
10. Spinocerebellar ataxia (SCA)
